channel.title: module on Golang | IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in module on Golang | IT Quicktasks

item.title: Golang Module
item.description: ~$ mkdir greetings ~$ cd greetings ~$ go mod init example.com/greetings In a text editor, create greetings.go with the following content: package greetings import "fmt" // Hello returns a greeting for the named person. func Hello(name string) string { // Return a greeting that embeds the name in a message. message := fmt.Sprintf("Hi, %v. Welcome!", name) return message } Call it from another module ~$ cd .. ~$ mkdir hello ~$ cd hello ~$ go mod init example.
